headline: My mind was blown when I saw what Dodonai can do.
quote: The first day I used Dodonai it provided summaries of all of the deposition transcripts from one of my cases in seconds, saving hours of my time and hundreds of client dollars. This is the future of the legal practice.
author: Ben

headline: A definite force multiplier for my practice.
quote: I've been having this modified-goldilocks problem with these tools where the narrative summary is either not detailed enough to be useful, or more detailed than I think a narrative summary should be. This strikes a good balance.
author: Anthony

headline: The product is excellent and well worth the price.
quote: Very easy to use platform as well.
author: Eydie

headline: Best legal AI platform I have tried thus far by a lot.
author: Camille
